comments_since_last_sample.body: Police needs to setup some stings... pump poison in to take out the thieves.
Terminix would not have to tell me to NOT leave $77,000 in jewelry in my home. Duh . . .
Uhh HELLO!!?? Duh!!! This idea totally came about in Breaking Bad!! I'm sure this has been going on for a LONG time!
So it’s like breaking bad but no ones cooking meth just stealing?
Excuse to watch breaking bad again.

Here's what blows my mind is that these huge houses don't have burglars systems! Why?  You have $70000 in jewelry sitting in a Box. Not even a locked one. Where I'm from if someone finds out you have $10000 sitting in your house, Especially unsecured, it won't be there by the next day...
Why wouldn’t the house be fully locked?
This was on an episode of CSI.
who's to say the actual company fumigating the house isn't actually in on the whole robbery...food for thought...or at least a employee of the company.
Not gonna lie that’s smart asf
Tell Jesse and Walt then lol
No one deserves to be robbed...BUT I MUST SAY WITH THE EXTREME DISTANCE BETWEEN THE ELITE AND THE REST IS SO FAR I CAN SAY I UNDERSTAND WHY THIS HAPPENS NOW MORE THEN EVER‼️💯🤔
I've been wondering when this would start happening for a few years now.   Smh
